text: Leviathan is the second album by Mastodon. Mastodon is an American heavy metal rock band. Relapse Records released the album on August 31, 2004. Leviathan is Mastodon's first concept album. It is based on the book Moby-Dick by Herman Melville. The album had three singles. These are "Iron Tusk," "Naked Burn," and "Blood and Thunder". ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2004 albums Category:Concept albums
